text: Food menu is great, my boy loves the food there! Teachers are very patience with my boy, he loves the teachers there. Greenery environment and lots of themes for kids to explore too. Really good preschool! Recommended. Principal Tr Shanti is very experienced in handling kids. The kids love her!

This preschool has always gone extra miles in teaching. Teachers nurture and kindle the interest in learning in kids. Mother tongue (Tamil) is being taught in an engaging manner. Montessori education and sensorial activities have provided a fun environment for my kids and they loved going back to school. Thank you and keep this momentum up!

MMI@Cck teachers are amazing. Teacher Shanti and Ms Vickey are very experienced teachers. They really loved and care for all their students.
My son enjoys going to school.
This place gave us a very family-oriented and comfy environment to study

We cannot say enough wonderful things about MMI CCK! From the moment we walked through the doors, we felt a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The teachers and staff are incredibly kind, patient, and truly dedicated to the children's growth and happiness.

My son transferred in to MMI CCK from another school. The best decision that I have ever made. The teachers are so welcoming and nurturing. I feel at ease when my son is in school and Iam at work as I know that he is well taken care of. The teachers regularly update photos of activities that they conduct. Seeing my son engaged through those pictures make me feel very happy. Thank you MMI CCK!
